name: hacker-dashboard
description: Dashboard for participants, judges, mentors and partners of QHacks.
author: Robert Saunders and Zack Harley

scripts.bootstrap: npm install --unsafe-perm || ((if [ -f npm-debug.log ]; then cat npm-debug.log; fi) && false) && lerna bootstrap
scripts.dev: lerna run build --scope email && lerna run dev --scope server --scope client --stream --parallel
